ygData.subject: RE: Kithicor annoyingness
ygData.msgSnippet: Too bad, there are things, people even, in some of those locked houses. More spookiness, there are three types of bears in Kithicor, Black, Young Kodiak, and
ygData.messageBody:
Too bad, there are things, people even, in some of those locked houses.

More spookiness, there are three types of bears in Kithicor, Black, Young
Kodiak, and Thumper, Kithicor's Grizz. So why when I went to see Ole Kith
last nite was there a regular Grizz standing in his place? Wasn't him
transformed either, unless he suddenly drops to somewhere around lvl 10 when
he does. Imagine my fright though? If I had come up from the house side
I'd have died for sure as Grizz still jump me, and surely Ole Thumper would
jumped right in making me one big heap o Grizz food. Also that 'a goblin'
shows up in place of one of the 'a wolf's gray wolf compatriots. Wonder if
he has the mythical grappling device the Sheriff wants so badly that at
least three people will tell you to take it to him if ever you find one...

Helped someone find their way out of Kithicor last nite. Scary thing was I
nearly got lost while doing it and I know the place. Those high ridges sure
look like zone edges when you get tired. Spooky to run two thirds the
length of the forest and not find the HighHold Pass you know is there!

Decided to be really brave and actually camped in Kith. With my back to the
crossroads stone!

Kitasi the wanderer in Kithicor

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 12:21 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kithicor annoyingness


From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

At 01:20 PM 7/14/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
> suddenly realized that he was INSIDE! How could
>>that be? He checked for trapdoors or holes in the floor, to no avail.
>>Suddenly he realized the full enormity of the situation. The door closed,
>>locked, he on the inside meant only one thing: he was trapped.
>
>AND?!?!?!?!?! What was IN there!?!?!?!

Oh.. heh. Yeah, that.

Nothing.

Not a thing.

It was dead empty.

Talies for Berthold
